title: Aagaya Vennilave Lyrics Arangetra Velai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Aagaya Vennilave Song Lyrics From Arangetra Velai
Music : Ilayaraja 
Singers : KJ Yesudas, Uma Ramanan
Lyricist : Vaali

Aagaya Vennilave
tharai meedhu vandhathaeno
Azhagaana aadai soodi 
arangerum velaithaano.

Malar soodum koondhale
malaik kaala 
megamaai kooda.

Uravaadum vizhigale
iru velli 
meengalai aada.

Aagaya Vennilave
tharai meedhu vandhathaeno
Azhagaana aadai soodi 
arangerum velaithaano.

Dhevaaram sandham kondu
dhinam paadum thendral ondru
poovaaram soodikondu
thalai vaasal vandhadhingu

thenpaandi mannan endru
thirumaeni vannam kandu
madiyaeri vazhum penmai
padiyaeri vandhadhindru

ilaneerum paalum thaenum 
idhazhoram vaanga vendum

koduthaalum kadhal thaagam
kuraiyaamal yaenga vendum

kadal pondra aasayil
madal vazhai maeni
thaan aada

nadujaama velayil
neduneram nenjamae kooda

Aagaya Vennilave
tharai meedhu vandhathaeno
Azhagaana aadai soodi 
arangerum velaithaano.

Malar soodum koondhale
malaik kaala 
megamaai kooda.

Uravaadum vizhigale
iru velli 
meengalai aada

Aagaya Vennilave
tharai meedhu vandhathaeno
Azhagaana aadai soodi 
arangerum velaithaano.

dhevaadhi dhevar koottam
thudhi paadum dheivaroopam
aadhaadhi kesam engum
oliveesum koyil dheepam

vaadaadha paarijaadham
nadaipodum vanna paadham.
kelaadha renugaanam
kili paechchil
kaetka koodum.

Adiyaalin jeevan needhi
adhigaaram seivadhenna.
azhangaara dhevadhevi
avadhaaram seidhadhenna

isai veennai vaarudho
idhamaana kaigalai neetta
srudhiyodu serumo
sugamaana raagame kaatta.

Aagaya Vennilave
tharai meedhu vandhathaeno
Azhagaana aadai soodi 
arangerum velaithaano.

Malar soodum koondhale
malaik kaala 
megamaai kooda.

Uravaadum vizhigale
iru velli 
meengalai aada.

Aagaya Vennilave
tharai meedhu vandhathaeno
Azhagaana aadai soodi 
arangerum velaithaano.
